Module org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker
Package org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.pdfexport

Class PdfBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.pdfexport.PdfBuilder
class PdfBuilder extends Object
This class can be used to build pdf from quizzes. These pdf files can be exported. The builder should only be accessed by classes in the same package. The PdfManager class is responsible for building pdfs and exporting them.

    Creates a new PDF builder that can be used to build a pdf.

  • Constructor Details

    • PdfBuilder

      public PdfBuilder(QuizModel quiz, String destination, String filename) throws IOException
      Creates a new PDF builder that can be used to build a pdf. Use the appropriate methods to construct a suitable PDF. Once the PDF has been build, use the saveAndWrite method to save the PDF at its designated destination.
      Parameters:
      quiz - Quiz that is connected to the pdf
      destination - In what directory to save the PDF once it has been built (please use forwards-slash ('/') as a path separator)
      filename - The name the PDF will be saved as. The .pdf extension may be omitted.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an IOException if the file cannot be written to.

  • Method Details

    • addQRcode

      public PdfBuilder addQRcode() throws IOException
      Add a QR code to the pdf. The QR code is linked to the Google Sheet of the stored quiz. The QR code will get placed in the top right corner of the first page. Multiple QR codes can not be added.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if the QR code could not be created.

    • addHeader

      public PdfBuilder addHeader(String headerText)
      Create a header for the pdf. The header contains the name of the quiz concatenated with the provided header text.
      Parameters:
      headerText - Optional text to add to the header in addition to the name of the quiz. If headerText is null or an empty string, no text is added.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.

    • addQuestions

      public PdfBuilder addQuestions(boolean includeQuestion, boolean includeAnswer)
      Add all questions to the pdf. If includeQuestion is true, questions will be included in the document. If includeAnswer is true, the answer will be included. If includeAnswer is false there will be exported a blank answer field.
      Parameters:
      includeQuestion - If questions are wanted. If this is false the method will just write the ordinal of the question and the possible score that can be gained form the question. If this is set to true, the question will also get added.
      includeAnswer - if answers are wanted. If this is set to false, a line where participants can enter their score is added. If this is set to true, the full answer string will be added.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.

    • addVerticalSpace

      public PdfBuilder addVerticalSpace()
      Adds vertical space to the document.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.

    • addFooter

      public PdfBuilder addFooter()
      Add a footer to the pdf. The footer includes a field for writing score.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.

    • addTeamNameField

      public PdfBuilder addTeamNameField()
      Adds a team name entry field to the PDF.
      Returns:
      The updated builder.

    • saveAndWrite

      public void saveAndWrite()
      Builds the pdf. And saves it to its destination.
